page.title: 10FOCUS-A village newsletter.
page.content: The parish magazine for the village of Great Horwood, takes the form of {Focus} a village newsletter. The newsletter is produced by volunteers and is distributed, free of charge,to every household in Great Horwood and the hamlet of Singleborough. Focus contains all the village news and contributions from various clubs and organisations. A diary of activities is included, so that everybody is aware of what is going on in the village. One interesting feature is the section which notes and welcomes new arrivals to the village. Focus is published monthly.The cost of producing the dupilicated format is met by a regular round of fund raising activities.
